evidence.claim: Ultrasound Solutions Corp uses AWS services for their cloud infrastructure.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations for handling patient data.
They support FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated through HL7 protocols.
EDI transactions are handled adhering to X12 standards.

icp.icp_reason: The company utilizes X12 EDI transactions and cloud APIs for healthcare integration.
